short_summary: Please see attached solicitation documents for detailed requirements.
full_summary:
# Tender for Leg Straps

## Overview

The Department of National Defence is soliciting proposals for the supply of leg straps as per the requirements outlined in this bid solicitation document.

## Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01007983
* **Solicitation Number**: W8485-237212/A
* **Publication Date**: September 22, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 21, 2022, 14:00:00 (UTC-4)
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of National Defence
* **End User Entities**: Department of National Defence (Canada)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: World
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding

## Required Deliverables

The tender includes the supply of the following items:

* 75 leg straps (GSIN: 5340F) with part number ID-503-501 and NSN: 01-692-2373
* 25 leg straps (GSIN: 5340F) with part number ID-503-501 and NSN: 01-692-2373
* 75 leg straps (GSIN: 5340F) with part number ID-57-503-502 and NSN: 01-692-2370
* 25 leg straps (GSIN: 5340F) with part number ID-57-503-502 and NSN: 01-692-2370
* 75 Back Pad assemblies (GSIN: 8465) with part number ID-57-491 and NSN: 01-692-2366
* 75 Back Pad assemblies (GSIN: 8465) with part number ID-57-491 and NSN: 01-692-2366

## Tender Documents and Instructions

The tender documents are available for download from the Canada Buys website. Bidders are encouraged to submit their proposals electronically using the epost Connect service.

## Important Notes

* Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name and model, and/or part number and NCAGE.
* The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Contact Information

Danny Lebel
dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca
